page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: 1. PIG'S AND PICKETS. ----------------- Number of players - any number. We begin with the pigs chasing pickets. We play it in the play ground in school. You are only to get out of jail when the pigs say so.Roughly half the are pickets and roughly half are pigs.One corner of the school is the gaol. Gaol officers just guard the gaol. Pickets are: Milwall fans, Brighton, Liverpool, and Brussels. Pigs try to catch pickets and pickets try to fight back. It is a very rough game with lots of swearing.
